name: SmartAlphaLoupe
description: SMART Alpha Loupe contract. This contract is intended as a helper for the frontend implementation.

functionDecorators.name: estimateNextEpoch
functionDecorators.description: Return the estimated parameters for the next epoch based on the current conditions. This is intended for frontend use only.

parameterDecorators.name: smartAlphaAddress
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the SMART Alpha system in which to check.

returnDecorators.description: The estimated parameters of the next epoch.

functionDecorators.name: userRedeemableJuniorTokens
functionDecorators.description: Return the amount of redeemable junior tokens for a user in a SMART Alpha system. This should be called statically on frontend.

parameterDecorators.name: smartAlphaAddress
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the SMART Alpha system in which to check.

parameterDecorators.name: user
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the user for which to check.

returnDecorators.description: The amount of redeemable junior tokens.

functionDecorators.name: userRedeemableJuniorUnderlying
functionDecorators.description: Return the amount of redeemable junior underlying for a user in a SMART Alpha system. This should be called statically on frontend.

parameterDecorators.name: smartAlphaAddress
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the SMART Alpha system in which to check.

parameterDecorators.name: user
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the user for which to check.

returnDecorators.description: The amount of redeemable junior underlying.

functionDecorators.name: userRedeemableSeniorTokens
functionDecorators.description: Return the amount of redeemable senior tokens for a user in a SMART Alpha system. This should be called statically on frontend.

parameterDecorators.name: smartAlphaAddress
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the SMART Alpha system in which to check.

parameterDecorators.name: user
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the user for which to check.

returnDecorators.description: The amount of redeemable senior tokens.

functionDecorators.name: userRedeemableSeniorUnderlying
functionDecorators.description: Return the amount of redeemable senior underlying for a user in a SMART Alpha system. This should be called statically on frontend.

parameterDecorators.name: smartAlphaAddress
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the SMART Alpha system in which to check.

parameterDecorators.name: user
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the user for which to check.

returnDecorators.description: The amount of redeemable senior underlying.
